about_the_game:
Get ready for an explosive twist on classic tank battles in Tanks Target Challenge! This thrilling fusion combines strategic tank combat with the precision and challenge of smashing targets!

In this high-octane arena, players take control of tanks and are tasked with more than just defeating opponents. Navigate through dynamic environments filled with moving targets and obstacles, and unleash your firepower to smash as many targets as possible before time runs out. Each level features unique layouts and target arrangements designed to test your tactical skills and reflexes.

Compete in this fast-paced, target-smashing adventure. With a variety of tank abilities and power-ups at your disposal, you’ll need to strategize and adapt on the fly to claim victory. Whether you’re dodging enemy fire or lining up the perfect shot, Tanks Target Challenge delivers an action-packed challenge that will keep you coming back for more!

mac_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Mac OS X 10.10.5 or above
  • Processor: Apple Intel or Silicon
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Graphics: 2 GB VRAM
  • Storage: 1 GB available space

name: Tanks Target Challenge

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS *: Windows 7
  • Processor: Intel Core i5
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Intel HD Graphics 4000
  • Storage: 1 GB available space

short_description: Shoot and smash targets as you navigate through dynamic environments filled with moving targets and obstacles! Unleash your firepower to destroy as many targets as possible before time runs out.
